verses.verse: <S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword;<s%> You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it as a <S%H1532>barber<s%>'s <S%H8593>razor<s%> to <S%H5674>you,<s%> and shall cause it to pass on your <S%H7218>head<s%> and on your <S%H2206>beard:<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%> to <S%H4948>weigh,<s%> and divide the <S%H2505>hair.<s%>

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> you shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> in the <S%H217>fire<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4692>siege<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled;<s%> and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a third <S%H7992>part,<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7992>it;<s%> and a third part you shall <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>
You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of it a <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> and <S%H6696>bind<s%> them in your <S%H3671>skirts.<s%>

Of these <S%H3947>again<s%> you shall <S%H7993>take,<s%> and cast them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> from it shall a <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> into all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> This is <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> her in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H776>countries<s%> are around <S%H5439>her.<s%>

She has <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against my <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> in doing <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and against my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> more than the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3988>her;<s%> for they have rejected my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and as for my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> they have not walked in <S%H1980>them.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because you are <S%H1995>turbulent<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> and have not walked in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> neither have <S%H6213>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> neither have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are around <S%H5439>you;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6213>Behold,<s%> I, even I, am against you; and I will execute <S%H4941>judgments<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in you that which I have not <S%H6213>done,<s%> and whereunto I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> any more the <S%H3282>like,<s%> because of all your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1121>you,<s%> and the sons shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H7611>you;<s%> and the whole remnant of you will I <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to all the <S%H7307>winds.<s%>

<S%H2416>Therefore,<s%> as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2930>surely,<s%> because you have defiled my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> with all your detestable <S%H8251>things,<s%> and with all your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> therefore will I also <S%H1639>diminish<s%> <S%H5869>you;<s%> neither shall my eye <S%H2347>spare,<s%> and I also will have no <S%H2550>pity.<s%>

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> of you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and with <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall they be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7992>you;<s%> and a third part shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7992>you;<s%> and a third part I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to all the <S%H7307>winds,<s%> and will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>

Thus shall my <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished,<s%> and I will cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> toward them to <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and I shall be <S%H5162>comforted;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H7068>zeal,<s%> when I have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> my wrath on <S%H2534>them.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2723>desolation<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5869>you,<s%> in the sight of all that pass <S%H5674>by.<s%>

So it shall be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H1422>taunt,<s%> an <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and an <S%H4923>astonishment,<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> when I shall execute <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on you in <S%H639>anger<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes;<s%> <S%H3068>(I,<s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it;<s%>)

when I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> on them the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of <S%H7458>famine,<s%> that are for <S%H4889>destruction,<s%> which I will <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3254>you:<s%> and I will increase the <S%H7458>famine<s%> on <S%H7665>you,<s%> and will break your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread;<s%>

and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> on you <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animals,<s%> and they shall <S%H7921>bereave<s%> <S%H1698>you;<s%> and pestilence and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H935>you;<s%> and I will bring the <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H3068>you:<s%> I, Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>
